an8.41:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an8.41:2.1: “Atthangasamannagato, bhikkhave, uposatho upavuttho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an8.41:2.2: Katham upavuttho ca, bhikkhave, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo?
an8.41:2.4: ‘yavajivam arahanto panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirata nihitadanda nihitasattha lajji dayapanna, sabbapanabhutahitanukampino viharanti.
an8.41:2.5: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno, sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharami.
an8.41:2.6: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:3.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirata dinnadayi dinnapatikankhi, athenena sucibhutena attana viharanti.
an8.41:3.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato dinnadayi dinnapatikankhi, athenena sucibhutena attana viharami.
an8.41:3.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:4.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto abrahmacariyam pahaya brahmacarino aracarino virata methuna gamadhamma.
an8.41:4.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam abrahmacariyam pahaya brahmacari aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an8.41:4.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:5.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto musavadam pahaya musavada pativirata saccavadino saccasandha theta paccayika avisamvadako lokassa.
an8.41:5.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam musavadam pahaya musavada pativirato saccavadi saccasandho theto paccayiko avisamvadako lokassa.
an8.41:5.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:6.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam suramerayamajjapamadatthanam pahaya suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato.
an8.41:6.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:7.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam ekabhattiko rattuparato virato vikalabhojana.
an8.41:7.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:8.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam naccagitavaditavisukadassanamalagandhavilepanadharanamandanavibhusanatthanam pahaya naccagitavaditavisukadassanamalagandhavilepanadharanamandanavibhusanatthana pativirato.
an8.41:8.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:9.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirata nicaseyyam kappenti—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.41:9.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirato nicaseyyam kappemi—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.41:9.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.41:10.1: Evam upavuttho kho, bhikkhave, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo”ti.
